name: Shadowfell Brand Tattoo
description: This tattoo is dark in appearance, depicting gloomy images of shadowy creatures. It has the following properties. Shadow Essence: You gain Darkvision with a range of 60 feet. If you already have Darkvision, its range increases by 60 feet. Shadowy Defense: When you take damage, you can take a Reaction to become insubstantial for a moment, halving the damage you take. Then the tattoo vanishes from your skin; it reappears on your skin at the next dawn.
